930880.name: THIS IS TORTURE TOGETHER
930880.description:
THIS IS TORTURE TOGETHER is an online co-op horror game for 1-4 players, following a structured campaign with randomized elements for replayability. One evening, you're out appreciating the distant city lights, when before you know it, you're knocked out cold. You awaken in a prison cell with a shadowy man telling you that he's going to make you beautiful. Now you must escape, either alone or together, and survive the twisted horrors that await within this facility...

The game tells a dark story, but is mainly focused around its gameplay, where you solve puzzles, escape threats, and try to survive the traps littered about this madhouse.

  • Up to 4 Player Online Co-op
    You can go online to play co-op with 2-4 players through the entire campaign.
  • Or play Single Player
    There is a Single Player mode to experience if you'd rather play the game alone.
  • 8 Stages
    There are eight levels to play through, all with different layouts & objectives, to pace the horror experience.
  • Replayability with Randomized Elements
    Though the game follows a campaign structure with set level design, each level has randomized events that change up each time you play through the level.
  • 3 Difficulties
    Breeze through "Go Easy On Us" difficulty, play the "Intended Difficulty" for a challenging but fair time, or torture yourself with "THIS IS TORTURE" difficulty.
  • Strong Atmosphere
    An ambiance that may unnerve you, as you try to escape the lair of a twisted kidnapper.
  • Relax in the Lobby
    In your downtime, you can relax in the Lobby, with several minigames to play.
  • Secret Lore
    This game has many secrets. Can you uncover the truth?
  • Multiple Endings
    Through your experiences, you may reach one of several endings.
930880.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
